entry.title: CVE-2018-8373 (VBScript Engine) and Exploit Kits
entry.content:
The [CVE-2018-8174](http://cve.circl.lu/cve/CVE-2018-8174 "Circl.lu CVE-2018-8174") is a bug that allows remote code execution in the VBScript Engine. Found exploited in the wild as a 0day via Word documents, [announced by Qihoo360 on April 20, 2018](https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404230886689265523 "新型Office攻击使用浏览器“双杀”漏洞"), [patched by Microsoft](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8174 "CVE-2018-8174 | Windows VBScript Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability") on May 8, 2018 and explained in details by [Kaspersky](https://securelist.com/root-cause-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174/85486/ "The King is dead. Long live the King! Root cause analysis of the latest Internet Explorer zero day – CVE-2018-8174") the day after. A Proof of Concept for Internet Explorer 11 on Windows 7 has been [shared publicly 3 days ago](https://github.com/smgorelik/Windows-RCE-exploits/tree/master/Web/VBScript), it's now beeing integrated in Browser Exploit Kits. This will replace [CVE-2016-0189][CVE-2016-0189] from july 2016 and might shake the Drive-By landscape for the coming months. [RIG](#rig): ------ *Spotted on the 2018-05-25* "TakeThat" wrote yesterday (2018-05-24) that he has integrated it and that infection rate has increased: Добавлен CVE-2018-8174
Add CVE-2018-8174
Пробив/rate +
[redacted]@exploit.im
[redacted]@xmpp.jp
And indeed today:
Figure 1: RIG launching code exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-05-25

| IOC | Type | Comment | Date | |---|---|---|---| | 206.189.147.254 | IP | Redirector | 2018-05-23 | | 95.142.40.187| IP | RIG | 2018-05-24 | | 95.142.40.185| IP | RIG | 2018-05-24 | | 95.142.40.184| IP | RIG | 2018-05-24 | | 46.30.42.164| IP | RIG | 2018-05-24 | | vnz[.]bit\|104.239.213[.]7 | domain\|IP | Smoke Bot C2 | 2018-05-25 | | vnz2107[.]ru\|104.239.213[.]7 | domain\|IP | Smoke Bot C2 | 2018-05-25 | | [92e7cfc803ff73ed14c6bf7384834a09](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/eeaa1ff2e9d33573590a8acb63cc8e6f390c0b056ff709e2945bf375d5ac5003/analysis/) | md5 | Smoke Bot | 2018-05-25 | | [58648ed843655d63570f8809ec2d6b26](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/21062145f36a21cd7d8de7066f18be71f3f5bb16b1347c6d1f1065f627744fe4/analysis/) | md5 | Extracted VBS | 2018-05-25 | Files: [PCAP on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/57281640e8ed514803a1c47c4ecb4e14462795b02308511d154b56d33e57ec00/detection) __Acknowledgement:__
+ Thanks to [William Metcalf](https://twitter.com/node5) and Frank Ruiz (FoxIT InTELL) for their help. [Magnitude](#magnitude): ------ *Spotted on the 2018-06-02* After a week without buying traffic, Magnitude is active again, now with CVE-2018-8174:
Figure 2: Magnitude successfully exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 to deploy Magniber Ransomware - 2018-06-02
Note: Magniber is back (after 1 month and half of GandCrab) in this infection chain and is now (as GandCrab) also accepting Dash cryptocurrency as payment | IOC | Type | Comment | Date | |---|---|---|---| | taxhuge[.]com\|149.56.159.203 | Domain\|IP | Magnigate step 1 | 2018-06-02 | | 69j366ma35.fedpart[.]website\|167.114.33.110| Domain\|IP | Magnigate step 2 | 2018-06-02 | | a23e5cwd602oe46d.addrole[.]space\|167.114.191.124 | Domain\|IP | Magnitude | 2018-06-02 | | [f48a248ddec2b7987778203f2f6a11b1](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/5990f09396ff018600f022e621921909bea8ea823398bd10dbade4f27b59e12f/analysis/) | md5 | Extracted VBS | 2018-06-02 | | [30bddd0ef9f9f178aa39599f0e49d733](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/24d17158531180849f5b0819ac965d796886b8238d8a690e2a7ecb3d7fd3bf2b/analysis/) | md5 | Magniber | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].bitslot[.]website\|139.60.161.51 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].carefly[.]space\|54.37.57.152 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].trapgo[.]host\|185.244.150.110 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].farmand[.]site\|64.188.10.44 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | Files: [Fiddler on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/1e5d0903198baac5eb213d290dd2c53124685de250ad18b709a6e83b826cdc69/detection) *(note: some proxy were used)* [GrandSoft](#grandsoft): ------ *Spotted by [Joseph Chen](https://twitter.com/jspchc) on 2018-06-14*
Figure 3: GrandSoft exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-06-14

Files: [Fiddler on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/b9847896178e810f9b51b07a89a78b88d5b651a629ca8c1290df57eada788937/detection) - [Pcap on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/9bec88033de8f4d913a6674168faf124ec5bb47216d15a42a7293e47c54ff7ff/detection) | IOC | Type | Comment | Date | |---|---|---|---| | easternflow[.]ml\|200.74.240.219 | Domain\|IP | BlackTDS | 2018-06-14 | | uafcriminality[.]lesbianssahgbrewingqzw[.]xyz\|185.17.122.212| Domain\|IP | GrandSoft EK | 2018-06-14 | | [cec253acd39fe5d920c7da485e367104](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/69ec63646a589127c573fed9498a11d3e75009751ac5e16a80e7aa684ad66240/analysis/) | md5 | Undefined Loader | 2018-06-14 | | [a15d9257a0c1421353edd31798f03cd6](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/f75c442895e7b8c005d420759dfcd4414ac037cf6bdd5771e23cedd73693a075/analysis/) | md5 | GandCrab | 2018-06-14 | | 91.210.104.247 |IP | AscentorLoader C2 | 2018-06-14 | | carder[.]bit |Domain | GandCrab C2 | 2018-06-14| | ransomware[.]bit |Domain | GandCrab C2 | 2018-06-14| __Acknowledgement:__
+ Thanks to [Joseph Chen](https://twitter.com/jspchc) who spotted the new exploit and allowed the capture of this traffic. __Edits:__
+ 2018-06-19 - Added the name for the Loader
[Fallout](#fallout): ------ *Spotted on 2018-06-30, most probably there since 2018-06-16*
Figure 4: Fallout exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-08-30
Files: [Fiddler on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/5202d382cb8e629a037e33117883dc4f44996b9f17ac774e18e7b0152e526eea/analysis/) - [Pcap on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/54fa6d37f97e65cc62d96a5f0c2e3de9f32f2c0b2b2bbb7bc51f4d2f1e07b206/analysis/) __Acknowledgement:__
+ Thanks to [Nao_Sec](https://twitter.com/nao_sec) for the initial referer. Thanks to [Joseph Chen](https://twitter.com/jspchc) for additionnal inputs [Kaixin EK](#kaixin): ------ *Spotted by [JayK](https://twitter.com/wugeej/status/1017208092482625536) on 2018-07-12*
Figure 5: Kaixin exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-08-11
Files: [Fiddler on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/fc46d7d51778396261eae02f11eaddce18c97aab9ef8227547094023ee58d3cf/analysis/) - [Pcap on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/d442c4c9e0911de27f28c0d06565c1790460b832e7439233ebd0b5526eb9f801/analysis/) [Hunter EK](#hunter): ------
Figure 6: Hunter including CVE-2018-8174 in its carpet bombing against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-08-30

+ Thanks to Frank Ruiz (FoxIT InTELL) for allowing this capture. [Greenflash Sundown](#sundown-gf): ------ *Spotted by [Chaoying Liu](https://twitter.com/ring_lcy) on 2018-09-05* Coming Soon __Acknowledgement:__
+ Thanks to [Chaoying Liu](https://twitter.com/ring_lcy) for the CVE identification. __Read More:__

__Post publication reading:__
[Rig Exploit Kit Now Using CVE-2018-8174 to Deliver Monero Miner](https://blog.trendmicro.com/trendlabs-security-intelligence/rig-exploit-kit-now-using-cve-2018-8174-to-deliver-monero-miner/) - 2018-05-31 - Trend Micro
[Delving deep into VBScript - Analysis of CVE-2018-8174 exploitation](https://securelist.com/delving-deep-into-vbscript-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174-exploitation/86333/) - 2018-07-03 - SecureList

entry.summary: The [CVE-2018-8174](http://cve.circl.lu/cve/CVE-2018-8174 "Circl.lu CVE-2018-8174") is a bug that allows remote code execution in the VBScript Engine. Found exploited in the wild as a 0day via Word documents, [announced by Qihoo360 on April 20, 2018](https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404230886689265523 "新型Office攻击使用浏览器“双杀”漏洞"), [patched by Microsoft](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8174 "CVE-2018-8174 | Windows VBScript Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability") on May 8, 2018 and explained in details by [Kaspersky](https://securelist.com/root-cause-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174/85486/ "The King is dead. Long live the King! Root cause analysis of the latest Internet Explorer zero day – CVE-2018-8174") the day after. A Proof of Concept for Internet Explorer 11 on Windows 7 has been [shared publicly 3 days ago](https://github.com/smgorelik/Windows-RCE-exploits/tree/master/Web/VBScript), it's now beeing integrated in Browser Exploit Kits. entry.title: CVE-2018-8373 (VBScript Engine) and Exploit Kits
entry.content:
The [CVE-2018-8174](http://cve.circl.lu/cve/CVE-2018-8174 "Circl.lu CVE-2018-8174") is a bug that allows remote code execution in the VBScript Engine. Found exploited in the wild as a 0day via Word documents, [announced by Qihoo360 on April 20, 2018](https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404230886689265523 "新型Office攻击使用浏览器“双杀”漏洞"), [patched by Microsoft](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8174 "CVE-2018-8174 | Windows VBScript Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability") on May 8, 2018 and explained in details by [Kaspersky](https://securelist.com/root-cause-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174/85486/ "The King is dead. Long live the King! Root cause analysis of the latest Internet Explorer zero day – CVE-2018-8174") the day after. A Proof of Concept for Internet Explorer 11 on Windows 7 has been [shared publicly 3 days ago](https://github.com/smgorelik/Windows-RCE-exploits/tree/master/Web/VBScript), it's now beeing integrated in Browser Exploit Kits. This will replace [CVE-2016-0189][CVE-2016-0189] from july 2016 and might shake the Drive-By landscape for the coming months. Found exploited in the wild as a 0day via Word documents, [announced by Qihoo360 on April 20, 2018](https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404230886689265523 "新型Office攻击使用浏览器“双杀”漏洞"), [patched by Microsoft](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8174 "CVE-2018-8174 | Windows VBScript Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability") on May 8, 2018 and explained in details by [Kaspersky](https://securelist.com/root-cause-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174/85486/ "The King is dead. entry.title: CVE-2018-8174 (VBScript Engine) and Exploit Kits
entry.content:
The [CVE-2018-8174](http://cve.circl.lu/cve/CVE-2018-8174 "Circl.lu CVE-2018-8174") is a bug that allows remote code execution in the VBScript Engine. Found exploited in the wild as a 0day via Word documents, [announced by Qihoo360 on April 20, 2018](https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404230886689265523 "新型Office攻击使用浏览器“双杀”漏洞"), [patched by Microsoft](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8174 "CVE-2018-8174 | Windows VBScript Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability") on May 8, 2018 and explained in details by [Kaspersky](https://securelist.com/root-cause-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174/85486/ "The King is dead. Long live the King! Root cause analysis of the latest Internet Explorer zero day – CVE-2018-8174") the day after. A Proof of Concept for Internet Explorer 11 on Windows 7 has been [shared publicly 3 days ago](https://github.com/smgorelik/Windows-RCE-exploits/tree/master/Web/VBScript), it's now beeing integrated in Browser Exploit Kits. This will replace [CVE-2016-0189][CVE-2016-0189] from july 2016 and might shake the Drive-By landscape for the coming months. entry.title: Inside BrushaLoader C2
entry.content:
The [CVE-2018-8174](http://cve.circl.lu/cve/CVE-2018-8174 "Circl.lu CVE-2018-8174") is a bug that allows remote code execution in the VBScript Engine. Found exploited in the wild as a 0day via Word documents, [announced by Qihoo360 on April 20, 2018](https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404230886689265523 "新型Office攻击使用浏览器“双杀”漏洞"), [patched by Microsoft](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8174 "CVE-2018-8174 | Windows VBScript Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability") on May 8, 2018 and explained in details by [Kaspersky](https://securelist.com/root-cause-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174/85486/ "The King is dead. Long live the King! Root cause analysis of the latest Internet Explorer zero day – CVE-2018-8174") the day after. A Proof of Concept for Internet Explorer 11 on Windows 7 has been [shared publicly 3 days ago](https://github.com/smgorelik/Windows-RCE-exploits/tree/master/Web/VBScript), it's now beeing integrated in Browser Exploit Kits. This will replace [CVE-2016-0189][CVE-2016-0189] from july 2016 and might shake the Drive-By landscape for the coming months. [RIG](#rig): ------ *Spotted on the 2018-05-25* "TakeThat" wrote yesterday (2018-05-24) that he has integrated it and that infection rate has increased: Добавлен CVE-2018-8174
Add CVE-2018-8174
Пробив/rate +
[redacted]@exploit.im
[redacted]@xmpp.jp
And indeed today:
Figure 1: RIG launching code exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-05-25

+ Thanks to [William Metcalf](https://twitter.com/node5) and Frank Ruiz (FoxIT InTELL) for their help. [Magnitude](#magnitude): ------ *Spotted on the 2018-06-02* After a week without buying traffic, Magnitude is active again, now with CVE-2018-8174:
Figure 2: Magnitude successfully exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 to deploy Magniber Ransomware - 2018-06-02
Note: Magniber is back (after 1 month and half of GandCrab) in this infection chain and is now (as GandCrab) also accepting Dash cryptocurrency as payment | IOC | Type | Comment | Date | |---|---|---|---| | taxhuge[.]com\|149.56.159.203 | Domain\|IP | Magnigate step 1 | 2018-06-02 | | 69j366ma35.fedpart[.]website\|167.114.33.110| Domain\|IP | Magnigate step 2 | 2018-06-02 | | a23e5cwd602oe46d.addrole[.]space\|167.114.191.124 | Domain\|IP | Magnitude | 2018-06-02 | | [f48a248ddec2b7987778203f2f6a11b1](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/5990f09396ff018600f022e621921909bea8ea823398bd10dbade4f27b59e12f/analysis/) | md5 | Extracted VBS | 2018-06-02 | | [30bddd0ef9f9f178aa39599f0e49d733](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/24d17158531180849f5b0819ac965d796886b8238d8a690e2a7ecb3d7fd3bf2b/analysis/) | md5 | Magniber | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].bitslot[.]website\|139.60.161.51 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].carefly[.]space\|54.37.57.152 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].trapgo[.]host\|185.244.150.110 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].farmand[.]site\|64.188.10.44 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | Files: [Fiddler on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/1e5d0903198baac5eb213d290dd2c53124685de250ad18b709a6e83b826cdc69/detection) *(note: some proxy were used)* [GrandSoft](#grandsoft): ------ *Spotted by [Joseph Chen](https://twitter.com/jspchc) on 2018-06-14*

+ Thanks to [Joseph Chen](https://twitter.com/jspchc) who spotted the new exploit and allowed the capture of this traffic. __Edits:__
+ 2018-06-19 - Added the name for the Loader
[Fallout](#fallout): ------ *Spotted on 2018-06-30, most probably there since 2018-06-16*

+ Thanks to [Nao_Sec](https://twitter.com/nao_sec) for the initial referer. Thanks to [Joseph Chen](https://twitter.com/jspchc) for additionnal inputs [Kaixin EK](#kaixin): ------ *Spotted by [JayK](https://twitter.com/wugeej/status/1017208092482625536) on 2018-07-12*
Figure 5: Kaixin exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-08-11
Files: [Fiddler on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/fc46d7d51778396261eae02f11eaddce18c97aab9ef8227547094023ee58d3cf/analysis/) - [Pcap on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/d442c4c9e0911de27f28c0d06565c1790460b832e7439233ebd0b5526eb9f801/analysis/) [Hunter EK](#hunter): ------

entry.title: Inside BrushaLoader C2
entry.content:
The [CVE-2018-8174](http://cve.circl.lu/cve/CVE-2018-8174 "Circl.lu CVE-2018-8174") is a bug that allows remote code execution in the VBScript Engine. Found exploited in the wild as a 0day via Word documents, [announced by Qihoo360 on April 20, 2018](https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404230886689265523 "新型Office攻击使用浏览器“双杀”漏洞"), [patched by Microsoft](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8174 "CVE-2018-8174 | Windows VBScript Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability") on May 8, 2018 and explained in details by [Kaspersky](https://securelist.com/root-cause-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174/85486/ "The King is dead. Long live the King! Root cause analysis of the latest Internet Explorer zero day – CVE-2018-8174") the day after. A Proof of Concept for Internet Explorer 11 on Windows 7 has been [shared publicly 3 days ago](https://github.com/smgorelik/Windows-RCE-exploits/tree/master/Web/VBScript), it's now beeing integrated in Browser Exploit Kits. This will replace [CVE-2016-0189][CVE-2016-0189] from july 2016 and might shake the Drive-By landscape for the coming months. [RIG](#rig): ------ *Spotted on the 2018-05-25* "TakeThat" wrote yesterday (2018-05-24) that he has integrated it and that infection rate has increased: Добавлен CVE-2018-8174
Add CVE-2018-8174
Пробив/rate +
[redacted]@exploit.im
[redacted]@xmpp.jp
And indeed today:
Figure 1: RIG launching code exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-05-25

+ Thanks to [William Metcalf](https://twitter.com/node5) and Frank Ruiz (FoxIT InTELL) for their help. [Magnitude](#magnitude): ------ *Spotted on the 2018-06-02* After a week without buying traffic, Magnitude is active again, now with CVE-2018-8174:
Figure 2: Magnitude successfully exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 to deploy Magniber Ransomware - 2018-06-02

entry.title: Inside BrushaLoader C2
entry.content:
The [CVE-2018-8174](http://cve.circl.lu/cve/CVE-2018-8174 "Circl.lu CVE-2018-8174") is a bug that allows remote code execution in the VBScript Engine. Found exploited in the wild as a 0day via Word documents, [announced by Qihoo360 on April 20, 2018](https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404230886689265523 "新型Office攻击使用浏览器“双杀”漏洞"), [patched by Microsoft](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8174 "CVE-2018-8174 | Windows VBScript Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability") on May 8, 2018 and explained in details by [Kaspersky](https://securelist.com/root-cause-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174/85486/ "The King is dead. Long live the King! Root cause analysis of the latest Internet Explorer zero day – CVE-2018-8174") the day after. A Proof of Concept for Internet Explorer 11 on Windows 7 has been [shared publicly 3 days ago](https://github.com/smgorelik/Windows-RCE-exploits/tree/master/Web/VBScript), it's now beeing integrated in Browser Exploit Kits. This will replace [CVE-2016-0189][CVE-2016-0189] from july 2016 and might shake the Drive-By landscape for the coming months. [RIG](#rig): ------ *Spotted on the 2018-05-25* "TakeThat" wrote yesterday (2018-05-24) that he has integrated it and that infection rate has increased: Добавлен CVE-2018-8174
Add CVE-2018-8174
Пробив/rate +
[redacted]@exploit.im
[redacted]@xmpp.jp
And indeed today:
Figure 1: RIG launching code exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-05-25

+ Thanks to [William Metcalf](https://twitter.com/node5) and Frank Ruiz (FoxIT InTELL) for their help. [Magnitude](#magnitude): ------ *Spotted on the 2018-06-02* After a week without buying traffic, Magnitude is active again, now with CVE-2018-8174:
Figure 2: Magnitude successfully exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 to deploy Magniber Ransomware - 2018-06-02
Note: Magniber is back (after 1 month and half of GandCrab) in this infection chain and is now (as GandCrab) also accepting Dash cryptocurrency as payment | IOC | Type | Comment | Date | |---|---|---|---| | taxhuge[.]com\|149.56.159.203 | Domain\|IP | Magnigate step 1 | 2018-06-02 | | 69j366ma35.fedpart[.]website\|167.114.33.110| Domain\|IP | Magnigate step 2 | 2018-06-02 | | a23e5cwd602oe46d.addrole[.]space\|167.114.191.124 | Domain\|IP | Magnitude | 2018-06-02 | | [f48a248ddec2b7987778203f2f6a11b1](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/5990f09396ff018600f022e621921909bea8ea823398bd10dbade4f27b59e12f/analysis/) | md5 | Extracted VBS | 2018-06-02 | | [30bddd0ef9f9f178aa39599f0e49d733](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/24d17158531180849f5b0819ac965d796886b8238d8a690e2a7ecb3d7fd3bf2b/analysis/) | md5 | Magniber | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].bitslot[.]website\|139.60.161.51 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].carefly[.]space\|54.37.57.152 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].trapgo[.]host\|185.244.150.110 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | | [ID].farmand[.]site\|64.188.10.44 |Domain\|IP | Magniber Payment Server | 2018-06-02 | Files: [Fiddler on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/1e5d0903198baac5eb213d290dd2c53124685de250ad18b709a6e83b826cdc69/detection) *(note: some proxy were used)* [GrandSoft](#grandsoft): ------ *Spotted by [Joseph Chen](https://twitter.com/jspchc) on 2018-06-14*

entry.summary: The [CVE-2018-8174](http://cve.circl.lu/cve/CVE-2018-8174 "Circl.lu CVE-2018-8174") is a bug that allows remote code execution in the VBScript Engine. Found exploited in the wild as a 0day via Word documents, [announced by Qihoo360 on April 20, 2018](https://weibo.com/ttarticle/p/show?id=2309404230886689265523 "新型Office攻击使用浏览器“双杀”漏洞"), [patched by Microsoft](https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2018-8174 "CVE-2018-8174 | Windows VBScript Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability") on May 8, 2018 and explained in details by [Kaspersky](https://securelist.com/root-cause-analysis-of-cve-2018-8174/85486/ "The King is dead. Long live the King! Root cause analysis of the latest Internet Explorer zero day – CVE-2018-8174") the day after. A Proof of Concept for Internet Explorer 11 on Windows 7 has been [shared publicly 3 days ago](https://github.com/smgorelik/Windows-RCE-exploits/tree/master/Web/VBScript), it's now beeing integrated in Browser Exploit Kits. This will replace [CVE-2016-0189][CVE-2016-0189] from july 2016 and might shake the Drive-By landscape for the coming months. [RIG](#rig): ------ *Spotted on the 2018-05-25* "TakeThat" wrote yesterday (2018-05-24) that he has integrated it and that infection rate has increased: Добавлен CVE-2018-8174 Add CVE-2018-8174 Пробив/rate + [redacted]@exploit.im [redacted]@xmpp.jp And indeed today: Figure 1: RIG launching code exploiting CVE-2018-8174 against IE11 on Windows 7 - 2018-05-25 | IOC | Type | Comment | Date | |---|---|---|---| | 206.189.147.254 | IP | Redirector | 2018-05-23 | | 95.142.40.187| IP | RIG | 2018-05-24 | | 95.142.40.185| IP | RIG | 2018-05-24 | | 95.142.40.184| IP | RIG | 2018-05-24 | | 46.30.42.164| IP | RIG | 2018-05-24 | | vnz[.]bit\|104.239.213[.]7 | domain\|IP | Smoke Bot C2 | 2018-05-25 | | vnz2107[.]ru\|104.239.213[.]7 | domain\|IP | Smoke Bot C2 | 2018-05-25 | | [92e7cfc803ff73ed14c6bf7384834a09](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/eeaa1ff2e9d33573590a8acb63cc8e6f390c0b056ff709e2945bf375d5ac5003/analysis/) | md5 | Smoke Bot | 2018-05-25 | | [58648ed843655d63570f8809ec2d6b26](https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/21062145f36a21cd7d8de7066f18be71f3f5bb16b1347c6d1f1065f627744fe4/analysis/) | md5 | Extracted VBS | 2018-05-25 | Files: [PCAP on VT](https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/57281640e8ed514803a1c47c4ecb4e14462795b02308511d154b56d33e57ec00/detection) __Acknowledgement:__ + Thanks to [William Metcalf](https://twitter.com/node5) and Frank Ruiz (FoxIT InTELL) for their help.
